import data from "../data/data"; import React from "react"; function ProductView(props) { const selectedProduct = data.productData.find( (i) => i.Id == props.match.params.urun_Id ); return (

{selectedProduct.urun_Ad}



Ürün Kodu: {selectedProduct.urun_Kod}



Adet Fiyatı: {selectedProduct.urun_Eski_Fiyat} TL



İndirimli Adet Fiyatı: {selectedProduct.urun_Yeni_Fiyat} TL


); } export default ProductView;
